name: Remember Me (itch) (Jorge Torres)
description:
In this game you assume the role of a dog named Will. You will travel through undiscovered lands finding out what happened with your past.

This game is based on a Japanese folk story, it is an early prototype using Unity 3D. It was worked along side three Japanese University Students that worked on the story part of the game. Only the first level is available.

Move around with W,A,S,D. dig for chest using Space Bar and Open chests with E.

(Note: This game is a prototype. Everything is work in progress.)

Credits:

Programming and Level Design: Jorge Torres

Story: Miyu Kanai, Fuka Hatada, Ramu Obata

All assets and music are from the Unity Asset Store.
